name: Scythe of the Unseen Path
tooltip:
Scythe of the Unseen PathLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Spiked Hilt, 2 Azure Idols, 5 Silver Scarabs and 5 Bone Scarabs to Warden Haro in Silithus.  You must also attain Exalted reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Spiked Hilt
- Azure Idol x 2
- Silver Scarab x 5
- Bone Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
